mapper.select: select * from ( select k.*, rownum rnum from ( select cat.id,cat.consumer,d.fwcyf_yyxtmc as consumer_name,c.fwcyf_yyxtbh as yybs, c.fwcyf_yyxtmc as yymc,cat.fwbs,b.fwmc,cat.ffbs,a.ffmc,a.ffms,cat.control_type,cat.cycle, cat.traffic_threshold,cat.enabled,cat.create_time,cat.update_time from config_access_traffic cat left join fwzyffzcb a on cat.ffbs = a.ffbs and cat.fwbs = a.fwbs left join fwzyzcb b on cat.fwbs = b.fwbs left join fwcyfzcb c on b.fwtgz_yyxtbh = c.fwcyf_yyxtbh left join fwcyfzcb d on cat.consumer = d.fwcyf_yyxtbh where 1 = 1 and cat.consumer like '%${consumer}%' and d.fwcyf_yyxtmc like '%${consumerName}%' and c.fwcyf_yyxtbh like '%${yybs}%' and c.fwcyf_yyxtmc like '%${yymc}%' and cat.fwbs like '%${fwbs}%' and b.fwmc like '%${fwmc}%' and cat.ffbs like '%${ffbs}%' and a.ffmc like '%${ffmc}%' and cat.control_type = #{controlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by cat.create_time desc ) k where rownum <= #{end} ) where rnum > #{start}

select count(1) from config_access_traffic cat left join fwzyffzcb a on cat.ffbs = a.ffbs and cat.fwbs = a.fwbs left join fwzyzcb b on cat.fwbs = b.fwbs left join fwcyfzcb c on b.fwtgz_yyxtbh = c.fwcyf_yyxtbh left join fwcyfzcb d on cat.consumer = d.fwcyf_yyxtbh where 1 = 1 and cat.consumer like '%${consumer}%' and d.fwcyf_yyxtmc like '%${consumerName}%' and c.fwcyf_yyxtbh like '%${yybs}%' and c.fwcyf_yyxtmc like '%${yymc}%' and cat.fwbs like '%${fwbs}%' and b.fwmc like '%${fwmc}%' and cat.ffbs like '%${ffbs}%' and a.ffmc like '%${ffmc}%' and cat.control_type = #{controlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
